p_63: Dashes ("-") indicate data for a particular field are not provided for this program in Residency Explorer. Reasons why data are not being provided can vary (e.g., they are not reported or available, they are not applicable, or they are based on an insufficient number of people for reporting purposes).

p_101: Matching to the specialty program includes a one-year preliminary internal medicine residency (PGY1) that is available only for trainees who complete all of their residency training at Mayo Clinic in Florida. Financial support for AIRP course provided. Provide funding for scholarly activity accepted to present at meetings.
